mapper.insert: insert into reservation (num, userid, qty, dday, rday, usein, usewifi, usenavi, useseat) values (#{num}, #{userid}, #{qty}, #{dday}, #{rday}, #{usein}, #{usewifi}, #{usenavi}, #{useseat})
mapper.select: select r.reserve_seq,rc.name,r.qty,r.rday,r.dday,r.usein,r.usewifi,r.usenavi,r.useseat from reservation r inner join user u on r.userid = u.userid inner join rentcar rc on rc.num = r.num where u.num=#{log};
